entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide documentation to use Owin correctly with ASP.NET Core #39943
    .NET 7 Planning
  • OpenID Connect correlation cookie and changes to SameSite=None Cookie-Handling #39941
    Backlog
  • FileBufferingReadStream - CanRead and CanSeek should return !_disposed #39939
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Survey: Repo Contribution Experience 2022 #39936
    Discussions
  • Blazor WASM Lazy Loading with App Bundling #39935
  • Blazor Hybrid validation cases #39933
    7.0-preview2
  • [Blazor server] On demand principal revalidation #39932
    Backlog
  • FallbackPolicy takes precedence over AuthorizeFilters added using Conventions #39930
  • Blazor server side, NavigationManager.NavigateTo not checking AuthenticationState #39929

Closed

  • Authorize attribute with JWT token is checked only when connection is made on websocket #39934
  • SignalR HttpContext access #39894
  • Should `failureMessage` in `AuthenticateResult` be nullable? #39916
  • [Blazor wasm, auth] 404 Static files downloading from /authentication #39876
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware doesn't always log request body #39911
  • Window Authentication in Linux .net core #39816
  • With .NET 7 SDK, the docs link should be updated when creating mvc/razor project in CLI #39862
    7.0-preview1
  • Inferring `FromServices` optionality based on nullability information #39757
    7.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Also build `npm` projects in parallel #39945
    area-infrastructure
  • Fire an event when allowing a bad request #39944
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • RazorPages: Save an allocation in PageRequestDelegateFactory #39942
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fixed misleading CookieOptions.HttpOnly summary #39937
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #39923
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.15
  • [release/5.0] Improve File access issues #39732
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.15
  • [release/6.0] [SignalR] Only minify .min.js files #39859
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Don't reference test asset projects in Build.props #39733
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Allow runtime compilation to be configured via the hosting startup. #39639
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.3
  • Fix typo in localization file #39633
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.3
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies for dotnet 5 #39464
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Use 1ES machines for official builds #39683
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.3 #39924
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Inferring FromServices optionality #39804
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • Write fields directive to streamwriter #39900
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Make UseUrls() override default hosting config #39836
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6b74da4` to `4517697` #39905
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Allowing empty FromBody parameters input based on nullability #39917
    breaking-change, area-mvc
  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6b74da4` to `4517697` #39904
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • Adding support to infer FromServices parameters #39926
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Don't reuse Pipe buffer when body is read #39376
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x
  • Allow pdb delta to be optionally included in a hot reload payload #39742
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.3
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
  • Proposal for how we handle more metadata for auth #39892
    area-security
